children.name: Framework

delegates.name: framework.onError
delegates.description: If framework throw error then is execute this delegate.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of controller or module. Sometimes can be value null.

params.name: uri
params.description: URI where framework throw error. Sometimes can be value null.

delegates.name: framework.onAuthorization
delegates.description: Authorization delegation for authenticating users. If user is logged then value in the callback must be a true or if is unlogged then must be a false. If is user authorized then is added 'logged' flag to the request flags otherwise 'unlogged'. If you forget call callback then is executed timeout.

params.name: flags
params.description: Request current flags. Read more about routing flags in the controller documentation.

params.name: isAuthorized
params.description: Set up current request flag: true = logged else false = unlogged

params.name: user
params.description: User object / instance. This object will be associated into req.user.

delegates.name: framework.onMail
delegates.description: This delegate sets a mail handler for sending emails.

delegates.name: framework.onVersion
delegates.description: This delegate adjusted file name of static file. Into the delegate are inserted all static files (e.g.: JavaScript, CSS, images from IMG tags, images from CSS, etc.). IMPORTANT: you must return {String} - new file name. For understand delegate click on the example.

params.name: name
params.description: The realitve name of static file.

delegates.name: framework.onRoute
delegates.description: Refusing request. You must return Boolean value. If false then is request refused.

delegates.name: framework.onRequest
delegates.description: Pre-request delegate. This delegate is executed first.

delegates.name: framework.onMeta
delegates.description: Render meta tags into the view.

delegates.name: framework.onLoad
delegates.description: This delegate is execute when is framework loaded.

delegates.name: framework.onValidation
delegates.description: Validation delegate for validating data models. You must return Boolean. If true then is value validated.

delegates.name: framework.onCompileCSS
delegates.description: This delegate replace an internal CSS compiler. For more information look up to the example. Delegate is not async.

delegates.name: framework.onCompileJS
delegates.description: This delegate replace an internal JS compiler. For more information look up to the example. Delegate is not async.

methods.name: framework.http
methods.description: Run the framework (HTTP).

params.name: mode
params.description: Mode: debug, release, test, debug test or release test

params.name: options
params.description: Custom options. (port, ip, config, https: { key, cert })

methods.name: framework.https
methods.description: Run the framework (HTTPS).

params.name: mode
params.description: Mode: debug, release, test, debug test or release test

params.name: options
params.description: Custom options. (port, ip, config, https: { key, cert })

methods.name: framework.refresh
methods.description: Refresh internal information (re-configure) and clear temporary data, resources, etc..

methods.name: framework.configure
methods.description: Configure framework.

params.name: value
params.description: Reconfigure framework. String === filename / String Array === new settings.

methods.name: framework.database
methods.description: Get a NoSQL embedded database connection.

params.name: name
params.description: File name of the NoSQL database.

methods.name: framework.worker
methods.description: Create worker.

params.name: id
params.description: Id of worker. According ID parameter you can get alive worker.

methods.name: framework.reconnect
methods.description: Reconnect HTTP/HTTPS.

methods.name: framework.stop
methods.description: Stop the framework

methods.name: framework.middleware
methods.description: Register a middleware. Middleware is executed before is executing a Request / Controller / Module. Middleware must be specified for use.

methods.name: framework.redirect
methods.description: Register route for HOST redirecting. This feature you can define in definitions.

params.name: oldHost
params.description: Old host with procotol. Example: http://www.domain.com

params.name: newHost
params.description: Hew host with procotol. Example: http://domain.com

params.name: copyPath
params.description: Copy full path with URL params?

methods.name: framework.route
methods.description: Register a new HTTP/HTTPS route. This function must be executed in a controller/module file.

params.name: url
params.description: The relative URL. You can create a dynamic param: /{param1}/{param2}/

params.name: options
params.description: Define more options for the route.

methods.name: framework.resize

params.name: url
params.description: The relative URL. Example: /img/small/*.jpg (only JPG) or /img/medium/ (all extensions argument).

methods.name: framework.websocket
methods.description: Register a new Websocket route to controller or module. This function must be executed in a controller/module file. For more information look up to the example.

params.name: url
params.description: The relative URL. You can create a dynamic param: /{param1}/{param2}/

params.name: controller
params.description: Controller object for specific socket events.

methods.name: framework.file
methods.description: Register a new file route to controller or module. This function can handle static files in a controller. This function must be executed in a controller/module file. For more information look up to the example.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of route to the file.

params.name: fnValid
params.description: Request validation. This function must return {Boolean}. If true then will executed @fnExec

params.name: fnExec
params.description: If valid @fnValid then will be executed @fnExec.

methods.name: framework.view
methods.description: Render a view. This method simulate a controller and renders HTML to string.

methods.name: framework.mail
methods.description: Send e-mail from a view.

methods.name: framework.merge
methods.description: Create a virtual route for merging of static files. Currently method supports merging: JavaScript or CSS.

params.name: filename1
params.description: File to merge (is read from public directory (for other reading use: ~).

methods.name: framework.error
methods.description: Create a new framework error. If this method doesn't contain any arguments then returns a function (A simple wrapper (callback function) for capturing only errors (if exist)).

methods.name: framework.problem
methods.description: Create a new framework problem.

methods.name: framework.change
methods.description: Create a new change.

methods.name: framework.module
methods.description: Get a framework module. All modules are defined in config['directory-modules'].

methods.name: framework.source
methods.description: Get a business logic. Business logic is defined in config['directory-source']. This method is uses for global function: include(name) and source(name). Include and Source are alias for framework.source().

methods.name: framework.model
methods.description: Get a framework model. All models are defined in config['directory-models'].

methods.name: framework.eval
methods.description: Eval script (live scripting).

params.name: script/url
params.description: Valid JavaScript script or valid URL address.

methods.name: framework.eval
methods.description: Eval function in framework context.

methods.name: framework.install
methods.description: Install some feature into the framework.

params.name: type
params.description: Can be: controller, module, model, view, definition, eval

params.name: declaration
params.description: Can be: URL address, string to eval or function to execute.

params.name: options
params.description: A custom options for new feature.

methods.name: framework.uninstall
methods.description: Uninstall some feature from the framework.

params.name: type
params.description: Can be: controller, module, model, schema or view

params.name: options
params.description: A custom options for new feature.

methods.name: framework.log
methods.description: Write to the log file.

methods.name: framework.usage
methods.description: Returned string is the Markdown syntax and contains usage informations. Look at this: http://www.partialjs.com/usage/

methods.name: framework.isProcessed
methods.description: Indicates whether the static file is processed internally. This function is bounded with framework.responseFile() or framework.responseImage().

methods.name: framework.responseStatic
methods.description: Response static file by the request path.

methods.name: framework.responseCustom
methods.description: Custom response. This function clears uploaded files, creates request/response stats and emits event - request-end.

methods.name: framework.responseFile
methods.description: Response file. A file extension must exists in config['static-accepts']. This function sets up HTTP cache (by the framework config mode - debug/release). If file is CSS or JS then will compiled. This function automatically supports HTTP RANGE streaming.

methods.name: framework.responsePipe
methods.description: Create response from URL (copy response to a response without headers).

methods.name: framework.responseImage
methods.description: Response image. A file extension must exists in config['static-accepts']. This function sets up HTTP cache (accoring the framework config mode - debug/release) and processed image is saved into the temporary directory.

params.name: filename
params.description: File name or stream of image.

params.name: useImageMagick
params.description: For an image manipulation the framework will use ImageMagick.

methods.name: framework.responseImageWithoutCache
methods.description: Response image without cache (slowly than responseImage()). A file extension must exists in config['static-accepts'].

params.name: useImageMagick
params.description: For an image manipulation the framework will use ImageMagick.

methods.name: framework.responseStream
methods.description: Response stream. All text/* content-types are compressed via GZIP (if is enabled config['allow-gzip']).

methods.name: framework.response401
methods.description: Response 401 - Unauthorized.

methods.name: framework.response403
methods.description: Response 403 - Forbidden.

methods.name: framework.response404
methods.description: Response 404 - Not Found.

methods.name: framework.response500
methods.description: Response 500 - Internal server error.

methods.name: framework.response501
methods.description: Response 501 - Not Implemented.

methods.name: framework.responseContent
methods.description: Response custom content.

methods.name: framework.responseRedirect
methods.description: Response redirect

methods.name: framework.setModified
methods.description: Set last modified or Etag header.

methods.name: framework.notModified
methods.description: Check if ETag or Last Modified has modified. If @compare === {String} compare if-none-match .... if @compare === {Date} compare if-modified-since. This function automatically flush a response 304 (if not modified). If content is not modified then return true.

params.name: strict
params.description: if strict (true) then use equal date else use great than date.

methods.name: framework.noCache
methods.description: Disable cache validation.

methods.name: framework.accept
methods.description: Add extension + ContentType into the accepts list.

params.name: contentType
params.description: This ContentType will be added into utils.getContentType(). Example: text/html

methods.name: framework.assert
methods.description: Add "test request" into the assertion testing.

params.name: method
params.description: HTTP method - GET, POST, PUT, DELETE or OPTIONS

methods.name: framework.assert
methods.description: Add "test functions" into the assertion testing.

methods.name: framework.test
methods.description: Run all tests in config['directory-tests'] (or only specific tests).

methods.name: framework.clear
methods.description: Clear temporary directory - remove all files in config['directory-temp'].

methods.name: framework.controller
methods.description: Get a controller.

methods.name: framework.unlink
methods.description: Remove files.

methods.name: framework.hash
methods.description: Hashing strings.

params.name: type
params.description: Type of hash algorithmus. Example: sha1, sha256, sha512, md5.

params.name: salt
params.description: Salt for hash. String == custom salt, Boolean (default: true), false == disable salt.

methods.name: framework.encrypt
methods.description: Internal cryptography function for encrypting of string or object. As sugar is config['secret'].

params.name: value
params.description: Value to encrypt into the string.

params.name: isUnique
params.description: Every encoded string will a other.

methods.name: framework.decrypt
methods.description: Internal cryptography function for decrypting of string or object.

params.name: jsonConvert
params.description: If decrypt value as JSON then is parsed into the object.

methods.name: framework.resource
methods.description: Read value from resource file.

methods.name: framework.routeJS
methods.description: Route a JS file accoring the config['static-url-js']. Returns the relative URL address.

methods.name: framework.routeCSS
methods.description: Route a CSS file accoring the config['static-url-css']. Returns the relative URL address.

methods.name: framework.routeImage
methods.description: Route a image file accoring the config['static-url-image']. Returns the relative URL address.

methods.name: framework.routeVideo
methods.description: Route a video file accoring the config['static-url-video']. Returns the relative URL address.

methods.name: framework.routeFont
methods.description: Route a font file accoring the config['static-url-font']. Returns the relative URL address.

methods.name: framework.routeDownload
methods.description: Route to download directory according the config['static-url-download']. Returns the relative URL address.

methods.name: framework.routeStatic
methods.description: Route a static file accoring the config['static-url']. Returns relative URL address.

events.name: framework.on('service')
events.description: This event is triggered every 60 seconds and is used for cleaning temporary data / cache.

events.name: framework.on('route-add')
events.description: This event is triggered when is added a new route.

events.name: framework.on('eval')
events.description: This event is triggered every when is executed JS code.

events.name: framework.on('install')
events.description: This event is triggered when is installed some feature through framework.install().

params.name: type
params.description: Which type was installed? (module, controller, model, etc.)

events.name: framework.on('uninstall')
events.description: This event is triggered when is uninstalled some feature through framework.uninstall().

params.name: type
params.description: Which type was uninstalled? (module, controller, model, etc.)

events.name: framework.on('configure')
events.description: This event is triggered when is re-configured the framework.

events.name: framework.on('reconfigure')
events.description: This event is triggered when the framework refreshed a configuration file and mapping versions.

events.name: framework.on('clear')
events.description: This event is triggered when framework clears internal information.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the internal information: refresh, resources or temporary

params.name: value
params.description: Value of the internal information: temporary: Object, resources and refresh = undefined

events.name: framework.on('problem')
events.description: This event is triggered when is created some problem.

events.name: framework.on('change')
events.description: This event is triggered when is a change.

events.name: framework.on('cache-expire')
events.description: This event is triggered when expired item in the cache. This item was removed from a cache.

events.name: framework.on('exit')
events.description: This event is triggered when framework is stopped. This event will not trigger when application stopped by force.

events.name: framework.on('request')
events.description: This event is triggered when begin HTTP request.

events.name: framework.on('websocket')
events.description: This event is triggered when begin WebSocket request.

events.name: framework.on('request-begin')
events.description: This event is triggered when begin HTTP request to a controller (NOT VALID FOR STATIC FILES).

events.name: framework.on('request-end')
events.description: This event is triggered when end HTTP request from a controller (NOT VALID FOR STATIC FILES).

events.name: framework.on('websocket-begin')
events.description: This event is triggered when begin Websocket request to a controller.

events.name: framework.on('websocket-end')
events.description: This event is triggered when end WebSocket request from a controller.

events.name: framework.on('load')
events.description: This event is triggered after is framework ready and after are loaded Definitions, Controllers, Modules, etc..

events.name: framework.on('init')
events.description: This event is triggered before are loaded all dependencies.

events.name: framework.on('controller')
events.description: This event is called every Request to Controller. In this event you can cancel request to the controller through controller.cancel().

events.name: framework.on('controller-render-head')
events.description: This event is triggered when the controller renders head tags.

events.name: framework.on('controller-render-meta')
events.description: This event is triggered when the controller renders meta tags.

properties.description: Property returns framework configuration. Property is readonly and it's has refreshed every 20 minutes.
properties.name: framework.config

properties.description: Property returns framework custom functions. You can define your own functions over the framework.
properties.name: framework.functions

properties.description: Is framework running in debug mode?
properties.name: framework.isDebug

properties.description: Is framework running in test mode?
properties.name: framework.isTest

properties.description: Custom framework id. Very helpful for the cluster.
properties.name: framework.id

properties.description: This property is helpful for a request restrictions.
properties.name: framework.restrictions

properties.description: Property returns Async object for asynchronous work.
properties.name: framework.async

properties.description: Property returns HTTP or HTTPS object.
properties.name: framework.server

properties.description: Property returns PORT number on the server listen.
properties.name: framework.port

properties.description: Property returns IP address on the server listen.
properties.name: framework.ip

properties.description: A global property for storing different values.
properties.name: framework.global

properties.description: This property contains all opened NoSQL embedded database.
properties.name: framework.databases

properties.description: This property contains static files mapping.
properties.name: framework.versions

properties.description: This property contains all alive workers.
properties.name: framework.wokers

properties.description: This property stores all helpers for rendering views. Views support only function, that means - you must store only functions.
properties.name: framework.helpers

properties.description: This property stores all registered controllers.
properties.name: framework.controllers

properties.description: This property stores all content from resource files. This property is cleaned every 20 minutes.
properties.name: framework.resources

properties.description: This property stores internal informations about paths, streaming and views. This property is cleaned every 20 minutes.
properties.name: framework.temporary

properties.description: This property stores the last 50 errors.
properties.name: framework.errors

properties.description: This property stores the last 50 problems.
properties.name: framework.problems

properties.description: This property stores the last 50 changes.
properties.name: framework.changes

properties.description: This property stores a websocket connections. Each property in this object contain URL address into the websocket.
properties.name: framework.connections

properties.description: This property stores all sources (business logic).
properties.name: framework.sources

properties.description: Framework cache for storing custom values in the memory.
properties.name: framework.cache

properties.description: Framework file system for dynamic manipulating web application files.
properties.name: framework.fs

properties.description: Framework path for getting all framework paths.
properties.name: framework.path

children.name: FrameworkCache

methods.name: framework.cache.add
methods.description: Add an item into the cache and return a value.

methods.name: framework.cache.read
methods.description: Read value from the cache.

methods.name: framework.cache.remove
methods.description: Remove an item from the cache.

methods.name: framework.cache.removeAll
methods.description: Remove items from the cache.

params.name: search
params.description: Search text in all cached keys.

methods.name: framework.cache.setExpire
methods.description: Set item expiration.

methods.name: framework.cache.clear
methods.description: Clear cache items.

methods.name: framework.cache.fn
methods.description: Simply cache for storing output from some function.

params.name: value
params.description: This value will be stored in the cache.

children.name: FrameworkFileSystem
children.description: This class helps with creating files (CSS, JavaScript, views, etc.).

methods.name: framework.fs.create.css
methods.description: Create a CSS file into the framework.config['directory-public'] + framework.config['static-url-css'].

params.name: content
params.description: A content of file or valid URL address (framework download content automatically).

params.name: append
params.description: Append content into end of file (IMPORTANT: if content doesn't exist in this file).

methods.name: framework.fs.create.js
methods.description: Create a JS file into the framework.config['directory-public'] + framework.config['static-url-js'].

params.name: content
params.description: A content of file or valid URL address (framework download content automatically).

params.name: append
params.description: Append content into end of file (IMPORTANT: if content doesn't exist in this file).

methods.name: framework.fs.create.worker
methods.description: Create a worker file into the framework.config['directory-workers'].

params.name: content
params.description: A content of file or valid URL address (framework download content automatically).

params.name: append
params.description: Append content into end of file (IMPORTANT: if content doesn't exist in this file).

methods.name: framework.fs.create.temporary
methods.description: Create a file into the framework.config['directory-temp'].

methods.name: framework.fs.create.view
methods.description: Create a view file into the framework.config['directory-views'].

params.name: content
params.description: A content of file or valid URL address (framework download content automatically).

params.name: append
params.description: Append content into end of file (IMPORTANT: if content doesn't exist in this file).

methods.name: framework.fs.create.resource
methods.description: Create a resource file into the framework.config['directory-resources'].

params.name: content
params.description: A content of file or valid URL address (framework download content automatically).

params.name: append
params.description: Append content into end of file (IMPORTANT: if content doesn't exist in this file).

methods.name: framework.fs.rm.css
methods.description: Delete a CSS file from framework.config['directory-public'] + framework.config['static-url-css'].

methods.name: framework.fs.rm.js
methods.description: Delete a JS file from framework.config['directory-public'] + framework.config['static-url-js'].

methods.name: framework.fs.rm.worker
methods.description: Delete a worker file from framework.config['directory-workers'].

methods.name: framework.fs.rm.view
methods.description: Delete a view file from framework.config['directory-views'].

methods.name: framework.fs.rm.temporary
methods.description: Delete a temporary file from framework.config['directory-temp'].

methods.name: framework.fs.rm.resource
methods.description: Delete a resource file from framework.config['directory-resources'].

children.name: FrameworkPath
children.description: This class helps with getting all framework paths. All paths reads from the framework configuration.

methods.name: framework.path.public
methods.description: Get the public path from framework.config['directory-public'].

methods.name: framework.path.models
methods.description: Get the public path from framework.config['directory-models'].

methods.name: framework.path.databases
methods.description: Get the public path from framework.config['directory-databases'].

methods.name: framework.path.logs
methods.description: Get the logs path from framework.config['directory-logs'].

methods.name: framework.path.temp
methods.description: Get the temp path from framework.config['directory-temp'].

methods.name: framework.path.workers
methods.description: Get the workers path from framework.config['directory-workers'].

methods.name: framework.path.views
methods.description: Get the views path from framework.config['directory-views'].

methods.name: framework.path.modules
methods.description: Get the modules path from framework.config['directory-modules'].

methods.name: framework.path.definitions
methods.description: Get the definitions path from framework.config['directory-definitions'].

methods.name: framework.path.controllers
methods.description: Get the controllers path from framework.config['directory-controllers'].

methods.name: framework.path.tests
methods.description: Get the tests path from framework.config['directory-tests'].

methods.name: framework.path.resources
methods.description: Get the resources path from framework.config['directory-resources'].

methods.name: framework.path.root
methods.description: Get the root path.

children.name: FrameworkRestrictions
children.description: This class creates framework restrictions. You can allow/disallow IP or custom headers.

methods.name: framework.restrictions.allow
methods.description: Set an allowed restrictions.

params.name: key
params.description: Header name or IMPORTANT: IP address.

params.name: value
params.description: Value for header value (otherwise framework compares IP address).

methods.name: framework.restrictions.disallow
methods.description: Set an disallowed restrictions. This is blacklist for IP address or custom headers.

params.name: key
params.description: Header name or IMPORTANT: IP address.

params.name: value
params.description: Value for header testing (otherwise will compared IP address).

methods.name: framework.restrictions.clearIP
methods.description: Clear all restrictions to IP.

methods.name: framework.restrictions.clearHeaders
methods.description: Clear all restrictions to headers.

children.name: FrameworkStats
children.description: This stats are filled automatically. You can change/resets stats any time.

properties.name: framework.stats.request.timeout
properties.description: Return a count of timeout requests.

properties.name: framework.stats.request.pending
properties.description: Return a count of pending requests.

properties.name: framework.stats.request.web
properties.description: Return a count of classic requests.

properties.name: framework.stats.request.xhr
properties.description: Return a count of XHR requests.

properties.name: framework.stats.request.file
properties.description: Return a count of file requests.

properties.name: framework.stats.request.websocket
properties.description: Return a count of websocket requests.

properties.name: framework.stats.request.get
properties.description: Return a count of GET (method) requests.

properties.name: framework.stats.request.post
properties.description: Return a count of POST (method) requests.

properties.name: framework.stats.request.put
properties.description: Return a count of PUT (method) requests.

properties.name: framework.stats.request.upload
properties.description: Return a count of upload (multipart) requests.

properties.name: framework.stats.request.xss
properties.description: Return a count of XSS requests (for example: Request data contain illegal characters).

properties.name: framework.stats.request.blocked
properties.description: Return a count of blocked requests (for example: POST request into the GET route).

properties.name: framework.stats.request['delete']
properties.description: Return a count of DELETE (method) requests.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.view
properties.description: Return a count of VIEW responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.json
properties.description: Return a count of JSON responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.websocket
properties.description: Return a count of WebSocket messages.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.file
properties.description: Return a count of File responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.plain
properties.description: Return a count of Plain responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.empty
properties.description: Return a count of Empty responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.binary
properties.description: Return a count of Binary responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.redirect
properties.description: Return a count of Redirect responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.timeout
properties.description: Return a count of Timeout responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.custom
properties.description: Return a count of Custom responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.forwarding
properties.description: Return a count of Host redirect responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.stream
properties.description: Return a count of Stream responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.streaming
properties.description: Return a count of Streaming responses (http range request).

properties.name: framework.stats.response.restriction
properties.description: Return a count of Restriction responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.notModified
properties.description: Return a count of not modified responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.mmr
properties.description: Return a count of Multipart-Mixed-Replace responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.destroy
properties.description: Return a count of destroyed requests.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.sse
properties.description: Return a count of Server Sent Events responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.error400
properties.description: Return a count of Error (400) responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.error401
properties.description: Return a count of Error (401) responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.error403
properties.description: Return a count of Error (403) responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.error404
properties.description: Return a count of Error (404) responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.error408
properties.description: Return a count of Error (408) responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.error431
properties.description: Return a count of Error (431) responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.error500
properties.description: Return a count of Error (500) responses.

properties.name: framework.stats.response.error501
properties.description: Return a count of Error (501)) responses.

children.name: FrameworkController
children.description:
FrameworkController is created after is validate a route. The framework knows two types of controller: HTTP/HTTPS Controller and WebSocket Controller. For more informations about controllers click on [How do controllers work?](http://docs.totaljs.com/how-does-it-work/controllers/).

_IMPORTANT MARKUPS_: http is for HTTP/HTTPS requests and WebSocket is for WebSocket connections. Some methods and properties support both options.

properties.name: controller.isTransfer
properties.description: Is an internal transfer? Example: controller.transfer('/url/') -> controller.isTransfer = true

properties.name: controller.$model
properties.description: Return the current model in current view. IMPORTANT: only for helpers.

properties.name: controller.get
properties.description: Parsed data from URL query. Is alias for controller.query.

properties.name: controller.body
properties.description: Parsed data from a request body.

properties.name: controller.post
properties.description: Parsed data from a request body. Is alias for controller.body.

properties.name: controller.files
properties.description: Parsed files from a request content.

properties.name: controller.url
properties.description: Current relative URL address without params and hash tags.

properties.name: controller.sseID
properties.description: Get lastEventID for Server Sent Events.

properties.name: controller.language
properties.description: Return request parsed HTTP header: accept-language.

properties.name: controller.repository
properties.description: Controller repository object for storing current request values.

properties.name: controller.path
properties.description: Return path object for getting all framework paths.

properties.name: controller.fs
properties.description: return file system for dynamic manipulating web application files.

properties.name: controller.status
properties.description: Gets / Sets status code of response.

methods.name: controller.validate
methods.description:
Validate an object model.
IMPORTANT: If 'properties' is string then properties read by the schema validation. Read more in Builders.SchemaBuilder.

methods.name: controller.validate
methods.description: Validate an object model by the schema.

methods.name: controller.header
methods.description: Set response header.

methods.name: controller.host
methods.description: Get host name.

methods.name: controller.cors
methods.description: Cross-origin resource sharing.

methods.name: controller.error
methods.description: Create a new framework error. If this method doesn't contain any arguments then returns a function (A simple wrapper (callback function) for capturing only errors (if exist)).

methods.name: controller.problem
methods.description: Mark an problem.

methods.name: controller.callback

params.name: view_name
params.description: A view name or is responses controller.json(some_data).

methods.name: controller.date
methods.description: Compare dates. This method can be used in views.

methods.name: controller.change
methods.description: Mark an change.

methods.name: controller.wait
methods.description: Add a function to async waiting list.

methods.name: controller.await
methods.description: Add a function to async list.

methods.name: controller.complete
methods.description: Run async functions.

methods.name: controller.run
methods.description: Run async functions. This function is same as controller.complete().

methods.name: controller.cancel
methods.description: Cancel executing controller.

methods.name: controller.log
methods.description: Append to log file.

methods.name: controller.meta
methods.description: Create a meta tags.

params.name: picture
params.description: Image for social networks and image is routed via framework.routeImage().

methods.name: controller.title
methods.description: Set meta title.

methods.name: controller.description
methods.description: Set meta description.

methods.name: controller.keywords
methods.description: Set meta keywords.

methods.name: controller.sitemap
methods.description: Add URL to sitemap. Sitemap is stored in: controller.repository.sitemap.

methods.name: controller.settings
methods.description: Create a custom setting for views.

methods.name: controller.component
methods.description: Return rendered string.

methods.name: controller.helper
methods.description: Return rendered string.

methods.name: controller.module
methods.description: Return a module object.

methods.name: controller.model
methods.description: Return a model object.

methods.name: controller.layout
methods.description: Set layout for current view.

methods.name: controller.models
methods.description: Return a controller models.

methods.name: controller.functions
methods.description: Return a controller functions.

methods.name: controller.notModified
methods.description: Check if ETag or Last Modified has modified. If @compare === {String} compare if-none-match .... if @compare === {Date} compare if-modified-since. This function automatically flush a response 304 (if not modified). If content is not modified then return true.

params.name: strict
params.description: if strict (true) then use equal date else use great than date.

methods.name: controller.setModified
methods.description: Set last modified header or Etag

methods.name: controller.setExpires
methods.description: Set expires header

methods.name: controller.head
methods.description: Append TAG to HTML head. The function supports append more string arguments. If function haven't arguments then return stored values as one string.

methods.name: controller.routeJS
methods.description: Route a JS file by the config['static-url-js']. Returns relative URL address.

methods.name: controller.routeCSS

methods.name: controller.routeImage
methods.description: Route a image file by the config['static-url-image']. Returns relative URL address.

methods.name: controller.routeVideo
methods.description: Route a video file by the config['static-url-video']. Returns relative URL address.

methods.name: controller.routeFont
methods.description: Route a font file by the config['static-url-font']. Returns relative URL address.

methods.name: controller.routeUpload
methods.description: Route a upload file by the config['static-url-upload']. Returns relative URL address.

methods.name: controller.routeStatic
methods.description: Route a static file by the config['static-url']. Returns relative URL address.

methods.name: controller.currentImage

methods.description: Set current path to video.

methods.name: controller.resource
methods.description: Read from resource file.

methods.name: controller.baa
methods.description: Basic access authentication (baa). Return object with user and password. If baa return null then function close a response (and sent authentification).

methods.name: controller.sse
methods.description: Send data via [S]erver-[s]ent [e]vents.

methods.name: controller.mmr
methods.description: Send a file or stream via [m]ultipart/x-[m]ixed-[r]eplace.

params.name: stream
params.description: If undefined then function read file from disk.

methods.name: controller.close
methods.description: Close a response (controller.mmr() or controller.sse() or by the custom response flushing). In the WebSocket close all connections or specific connection (by the names).

params.name: names
params.description: Allowed in a websocket request. Name of websocket clients.

methods.name: controller.clear
methods.description: Clear uploaded files. Important: for prevent auto clearing use controller.noClear().

methods.name: controller.custom
methods.description: Set custom responses.

methods.name: controller.noClear
methods.description: Enable/Disable auto clearing of uploaded files. For manual clearing of uploaded files use: controller.clear().

methods.name: controller.proxy
methods.description: Proxy request to other total.js website.

methods.name: controller.database
methods.description: Return a database object. This function is alias for framework.database().

methods.description: Response plain text (text/plain).

methods.name: controller.empty
methods.description: Response empty content (text/plain).

methods.name: controller.pipe
methods.description: Create response from URL (copy response to a response without headers).

params.name: downloadName
params.description: This value will added into Content-Disposition header.

methods.name: controller.redirect
methods.description: Response redirect.

methods.name: controller.transfer
methods.description: Transfer current request to a new route.

methods.name: controller.memorize
methods.description: Memorize output of controller.view() - layout is not cached (only view), controller.json() and controller.plain(). This function improves your response time. Data are saved into the memory.

params.name: fnTo
params.description: Is executed when is cache empty.

params.name: fnFrom
params.description: Is executed when is content read from the cache.

methods.name: controller.redirectAsync
methods.description: Response redirect (async). This method is called when all operation in async (controller.await(), controller.wait()) are completed.

methods.name: controller.view
methods.description: Response a view. IMPORTANT: view is loaded by the controller name. Example: my-controller-name.js set view path to /views/my-controller-name/some-view.html - except default.js of controller name. If your view name starts with ~ then will skipped a controller directory name.

params.name: isPartial
params.description: If true - then function return rendered HTML.

methods.name: controller.viewAsync
methods.description: Response a view. IMPORTANT: view is loaded by the controller name. Example: my-controller-name.js set view path to /views/my-controller-name/some-view.html - except default.js of controller name. If your view name starts with ~ then will skipped a controller directory name. This method is called when all operation in async (controller.await(), controller.wait()) are completed.

methods.name: controller.mail
methods.description: Send e-mail from a view.

methods.name: controller.send
methods.description: Send message via websocket to online users. Message will be sended to all connections or specific connection.

params.name: blacklist
params.description: You can specify a client blacklist.

methods.name: controller.all
methods.description: Get each client connection.

params.name: fn
params.description: This function is called in each client.

methods.name: controller.find
methods.description: Find client connection.

params.name: id
params.description: Id of client or prepare function.

params.name: detailed
params.description: Framework wants detailed informations about usage.

delegates.name: exports.request
delegates.description: Delegate for capture each request into this controller.

events.name: controller.on('open')
events.description: This event is triggered when is user connected.

events.name: controller.on('close')
events.description: This event is triggered when is user disconnect.

events.name: controller.on('message')
events.description: This event is triggered when recieved a message.

events.name: controller.on('send')
events.description: This event is triggered when is sended a message.

events.name: controller.on('destroy')
events.description: This event is triggered when is WebSocket destroyed.

events.name: controller.on('error')
events.description: This event is triggered when is error.

properties.description: Parsed data from URL params. Alias for: client.query.

methods.description: Send message via websocket to client.

methods.name: client.close
methods.description: Close a connection.

children.name: FrameworkViews
children.description: For more informations about views click on [How do views work?](http://docs.partialjs.com/how-does-it-work/views/). Views support simple conditions and custom helpers.

properties.name: @{title}
properties.description: Render title value. Title is set via @{meta('title')} method.

properties.name: @{description}
properties.description: Render description value. Description is set via @{meta('title', 'description')} method.

properties.name: @{keywords}
properties.description: Render keywords value. Keywords is set via @{meta('title', 'description', 'keywords')} method.

properties.name: @{body}
properties.description: This tag is available in a layout. Into this tag are render all views.

properties.name: @{hostname}
properties.description: Get a hostname from current request.

properties.name: @{repository.customKey}
properties.description: Get value from a repository object.

properties.name: @{index}
properties.description: Get current index in foreach loop.

methods.name: @{title}
methods.description: Create title.

methods.name: @{description}
methods.description: Create description.

methods.name: @{keywords}
methods.description: Create keywords.

methods.name: @{component}
methods.description: Render component.

methods.name: @{helper}
methods.description: Render helper.

methods.name: @{meta}
methods.description: Create META tags.

params.name: imageURL
params.description: Social image href (URL with hostname) - og:image, twitter:image.

methods.name: @{image}
methods.description: Create IMG tag. URL address routes into the config['static-url-image'] (by the currentImage).

methods.name: @{download}
methods.description: Create an A TAG. URL address routes into the config['static-url-upload'] (by the currentUpload).

params.name: downloadName
params.description: Download name - is added into the download attribute.

methods.name: @{css}
methods.description: Insert CSS file into the webpage. Function return LINK tag by the config['static-url-css'].

methods.name: @{js}
methods.description: Insert JS file into the webpage. Function return SCRIPT tag by the config['static-url-js'].

methods.name: @{favicon}
methods.description: Insert favicon into the webpage. Function return LINK tag by the config['static-url'].

methods.name: @{dns}
methods.description:
Add dns prefetch tag into the HTML head. This result is rendered via @{head} tag.
Output: <link rel="dns-prefetch" ...

methods.name: @{prefetch}
methods.description:
Add prefetch tag into the HTML head. This result is rendered via @{head} tag.
Output: <link rel="prefetch" ...

methods.name: @{prerender}
methods.description:
Add prerender tag into the HTML head. This result is rendered via @{head} tag.
Output: <link rel="prerender" ...

methods.name: @{next}
methods.description:
Add next (NEXT PAGE) tag into the HTML head. This result is rendered via @{head} tag.
Output: <link rel="next" ...

methods.name: @{prev}
methods.description:
Add prev (PREVIOUS PAGE) tag into the HTML head. This result is rendered via @{head} tag.
Output: <link rel="prev" ...

methods.name: @{canonical}
methods.description:
Add canonical tag into the HTML head. This result is rendered via @{head} tag.
Output: <link rel="canonical" ...

methods.name: @{head}
methods.description: Add value into the HTML head. This result is rendered via @{head} - without arguments.

params.name: value
params.description: Add a value into the HTML head.

methods.name: @{place}
methods.description: Create / Render a placeholder. If the value is not defined then function renders content into the current position.

methods.name: @{header}
methods.description: Set custom response header.

methods.name: @{modified}
methods.description: Set Last-Modified value - this function create response header.

methods.name: @{etag}
methods.description: Set ETag value - this function create response header.

methods.name: @{routeJS}
methods.description: Route URL to JavaScript directory by the config['static-url-js'].

methods.name: @{currentView}
methods.description: Set additional path. This path will add into the default path.

methods.name: @{currentContent}
methods.description: Set additional path. This path will add into the default path.

methods.name: @{currentTemplate}
methods.description: Set additional path. This path will add into the default path.

methods.name: @{currentJS}
methods.description: Set additional path. This path will add into the default path.

methods.name: @{routeCSS}
methods.description: Route URL to CSS directory by the config['static-url-css'].

methods.name: @{currentCSS}
methods.description: Set additional path. This path will add into the default path.

methods.name: @{routeUpload}
methods.description: Route URL to Upload directory by the config['static-url-upload'].

methods.name: @{currentUpload}
methods.description: Set additional path. This path will add into the default path.

methods.name: @{routeImage}
methods.description: Route URL to Image directory by the config['static-url-image'].

methods.name: @{currentImage}
methods.description: Set additional path. This path will add into the default path.

methods.name: @{routeVideo}
methods.description: Route URL to Video directory by the config['static-url-video'].

methods.name: @{currentVideo}
methods.description: Set additional path. This path will add into the default path.

methods.name: @{routeStatic}
methods.description: Route URL to static directory by the config['static-url'].

methods.name: @{resource}
methods.description: Read value from resource file.

methods.name: @{layout}
methods.description: Change layout of view.

methods.name: @{sitemap}
methods.description: Add link to sitemap collection.

methods.name: @{sitemap}
methods.description: Get all links.

methods.name: @{view}
methods.description: Render view into current view.

params.name: expire
params.description: Add to current view to cache. Example: 1 minute

methods.name: @{viewToggle}
methods.description: Render view into current view.

params.name: expire
params.description: Add to current view to cache. Example: 1 minute

methods.name: @{json}
methods.description: Serialize object into the JSON. If is set id attribute then is generate: <script type="application/json" ...

methods.name: @{options}
methods.description:
Render option tags from array.

<select>
@{options([{ name: 'All', value: 0 }, { name: 'One', value: 1 }], 1)}
</select>

methods.name: @{checked}
methods.description: Render checked attribute: checked="checked"

methods.name: @{disabled}
methods.description: Render disabled attribute: disabled="disabled"

methods.name: @{readonly}
methods.description: Render readonly attribute: readonly="readonly"

methods.name: @{selected}
methods.description: Render selected attribute: selected="selected"

methods.name: @{checkbox}

params.name: label
params.description: String = Input label, Object = Additional attributes.

methods.name: @{radio}

params.name: label
params.description: String = Input label, Object = Additional attributes.

methods.name: @{text}
methods.description:
Render text box <input type="text" ... 

@{text('Name', { class: 'form', maxlength: 30, placeholder: 'Your name', required: true })}

methods.name: @{hidden}
methods.description:
Render hidden box <input type="hidden" ... 

@{hidden('Custom')}

methods.name: @{textarea}
methods.description:
Render textarea <textarea ... 

@{textarea('Description', { class: 'form', placeholder: 'Your name', required: true })}

children.name: FrameworkUtils

methods.name: utils.download
methods.description: Download content or file from an url address.

methods.name: utils.ls
methods.description: Lists the contents of a directory.

params.name: url
params.description: URL where send this this stream/file.

methods.name: utils.isEmpty
methods.description: Is empty object?

methods.name: utils.isEqual
methods.description: Compares properties.

methods.name: utils.queue
methods.description: A queue list. Usage for e.g. EMFILE, too many open files. Argument 'fn' is executed when running count of 'fn' is less than 'maximum' argument.

methods.name: utils.request
methods.description: Create a request (GET/POST/DELETE/PUT) to URL address with custom params and headers.

params.name: data
params.description: JSON (by the content type) is deserialized to object.

methods.name: utils.trim
methods.description: TRIM all string properties in an object.

methods.name: utils.extend
methods.description: Extend object. Function return extended target object.

methods.description: Copy values between objects. Function return target object.

methods.name: utils.assign
methods.description: Assign value into the object property by the path.

params.name: fn
params.description: Object can replace value and function too.

methods.name: utils.reduce
methods.description: Reduce object properties by the array or object. This function is helpful for received model from a form.

params.name: prop
params.description: Reduce an object properties by the array or object.

methods.name: utils.isRelative
methods.description: Check if relative URL address.

methods.description: Is null or empty string?

methods.name: utils.parseFloat
methods.description: Safe parsing float number.

methods.description: Check if value is Array.

methods.description: Check if value is Date.

methods.name: utils.getContentType
methods.description: Get content type from file extension.

methods.name: utils.etag
methods.description: Create ETag from a text.

methods.name: utils.path
methods.description: Correct an URL path. Function will add a delimiter to end of path - if not exist.

methods.name: utils.random
methods.description: Get a random number.

methods.name: utils.GUID
methods.description: Create an unique identifier.

methods.name: utils.distance

Validate an object model.
IMPORTANT: If 'properties' is string then properties read by the schema validation. Read more in Builders.SchemaBuilder.

methods.name: message.from

methods.description: Send a message.

methods.name: file.isAudio
methods.description: Return true if the file is audio.

methods.name: file.read
methods.description: Read file.

methods.name: file.stream
methods.description: Get file readable stream.

methods.name: file.pipe
methods.description: Pipe stream to stream.

methods.name: file.md5
methods.description: Get MD5 sum.

methods.name: file.image
methods.description: Get FrameworkImage object.

children.name: HttpRouteOptions

properties.name: flags
properties.description: Request flags. If flag starts with # is loaded as middleware.

properties.name: timeout
properties.description: Response timeout. If you want to disable timeout - set the timeout to false.

children.name: HttpRouteOptionsFlags

properties.name: xml
properties.description: Request body must be a valid XML.

properties.name: -xhr
properties.description: This flag removes a listening of route for XMLHttpRequest.

properties.name: noxhr
properties.description: This flag removes a listening of route for XMLHttpRequest. This flag is alias for -xhr.

properties.name: json
properties.description: Request must contain: POST method and content of the request must be a valid JSON format.

properties.name: http
properties.description: Request protocol must be HTTP. In the websocket framework replaces HTTP to WS.

properties.name: https
properties.description: Request protocol must be HTTPS. In the websocket framework replaces HTTPS to WSS.

properties.name: upload
properties.description: Request must contain: POST method and multipart/form-data.

properties.name: xss
properties.description: Framework doesn't check request for XSS attack.

properties.name: debug
properties.description: Set route for debug mode only.

properties.name: mmr
properties.description: Set route for Multipart Mixed Replace mode.

properties.name: sse
properties.description: Set route for Server Sent Events.

children.name: Request.prototype
children.description: Request prototype is available in each node.js / total.js script. This prototype is defined in Framework (index.js).

methods.name: Request.prototype.authorization
methods.description: Read authorization data from the request. Method return { name: 'username', password: 'password' } - if it contains the request.

methods.name: Request.prototype.cookie
methods.description: Read value from cookie. For write cookies read Response.prototype.

methods.name: Request.prototype.hostname
methods.description: Get hostname from URL address.

methods.name: Request.prototype.signature
methods.description: Create a request signature.

methods.name: Request.prototype.clear
methods.description: Clear uploaded files. This function is executed automatically.

methods.name: Request.prototype.noCache
methods.description: Disable cache validation.

children.name: Response.prototype
children.description: Response prototype is available in each node.js / total.js script. This prototype is defined in Framework (index.js).

methods.name: Response.prototype.cookie
Response.prototype.noCache
methods.description: Disable HTTP cache.

methods.name: Response.prototype.send
methods.description: Send data.

methods.name: Response.prototype.json
methods.description: Send JSON.

methods.name: Response.prototype.continue
methods.description: Continue to process of request by the framework.

methods.name: Response.prototype.file
methods.description: Send a file.

methods.name: Response.prototype.image
methods.description: Send a image.

methods.name: Response.prototype.stream
methods.description: Send a stream.

children.name: String.prototype
children.description: String prototype is available in each node.js / total.js script. Prototypes are defined in FrameworkUtils (utils.js). FrameworkUtils is a global variable.

methods.name: String.prototype.trim
methods.description: Trim white characters.

methods.name: String.prototype.parseXML
methods.description: This method parses XML from string to Object.

methods.name: String.prototype.toSearch
methods.description: This method lowers chars, removes diacritics and all operators without spaces.

methods.name: String.prototype.count
methods.description: Word counter.

params.name: word
params.description: Word to seach in this string.

methods.name: String.prototype.parseDate
methods.description: Parse date from this string. String must be in this format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss while time or date is optional.

methods.name: String.prototype.replaceAt
methods.description: Replace string according the index.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to replace. A replacement will be: index + text.length.

methods.name: String.prototype.parseDateExpire
methods.description: Parse expiration date.

methods.name: String.prototype.contains
methods.description: Check if this string contain a value.

params.name: mustAll
params.description: This string must contain all values.

methods.name: String.prototype.startsWith
methods.description: Check if string is started with text.

methods.name: String.prototype.endsWith
methods.description: Check if string is ended with text.

methods.name: String.prototype.parseConfig
methods.description: Parse configuration from a string (same configuration as framework configuration)

methods.name: String.prototype.format
methods.description: Formatting string like C#. Example: 'My name is {0} {1}'.format('Peter', 'Širka');

methods.name: String.prototype.encode
methods.description: Encode string to HTML safe characters.

methods.name: String.prototype.decode
methods.description: Decode string from HTML safe characters.

methods.name: String.prototype.urlEncode
methods.description: Encode string to URL safe characters.

methods.name: String.prototype.urlDecode
methods.description: Decode string from URL safe characters.

methods.name: String.prototype.params
methods.description:
Simple string formatting like template formatting (keys are represent properties). Example:
'My name is {name} and I was born: {birthday | dd.MM.yyyy}'.params({ name: 'Peter', birthdate: new Date() })

methods.name: String.prototype.max
methods.description: Set maximum length of string.

methods.name: String.prototype.isJSON
methods.description: Check if this string is valid JSON.

methods.name: String.prototype.isURL
methods.description: Check if this string is valid URL address.

methods.name: String.prototype.isEmail
methods.description: Check if this string is valid e-mail address.

methods.name: String.prototype.isBoolean
methods.description: Check is boolean type.

methods.name: String.prototype.parseInt
methods.description: Parse int number from string.

methods.name: String.prototype.parseFLoat
methods.description: Parse float number from string.

methods.name: String.prototype.toUnicode
methods.description: Convert string to unicode HTML characters.

methods.name: String.prototype.fromUnicode
methods.description: Load string from unicode HTML characters.

methods.name: String.prototype.sha1
methods.description: Convert string to SHA1.

methods.name: String.prototype.hash
methods.description: Convert string to hash.

params.name: type
params.description: empty = fast type, sha1, sha256, sha512 or md5

methods.name: String.prototype.sha256
methods.description: Convert string to SHA256.

methods.name: String.prototype.sha512
methods.description: Convert string to SHA512.

methods.name: String.prototype.md5
methods.description: Convert string to MD5.

methods.name: String.prototype.encrypt
methods.description: Encrypt string by the key.

methods.name: String.prototype.decrypt
methods.description: Decrypt encoded string by the key.

methods.name: String.prototype.base64ToFile
methods.description: Parse base64 to buffer and save to file.

methods.name: String.prototype.base64ContentType
methods.description: Get content type from base64 string. Example of string: data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAADIA...

methods.name: String.prototype.removeDiacritics
methods.description: Remove diacritics from string.

methods.name: String.prototype.padLeft
methods.description: Character padding - left.

methods.name: String.prototype.padRight
methods.description: Character padding - right.

methods.name: String.prototype.slug
methods.description:
Create link (URL address) from this string. Example: 'total.js - web application framework for node.js'.link(),
result: 'total-js-web-application-framework-for-node-js'

methods.name: String.prototype.linker
methods.description:
Create link (URL address) from this string. Example: 'total.js - web application framework for node.js'.link(),
result: 'total-js-web-application-framework-for-node-js'

methods.name: String.prototype.pluralize
methods.description: Pluralize string. This string is converted into the Number and then is pluralized.

children.name: Number.prototype
children.description: Number prototype is available in each node.js / total.js script. Prototypes are defined in FrameworkUtils (utils.js). FrameworkUtils is a global variable.

methods.name: Number.prototype.VAT
methods.description: VAT calculator. Example: (100).VAT(20) == 83.33

methods.name: Number.prototype.parseDate
methods.description: Parse date from number.

methods.name: Number.prototype.discount
methods.description: Discount calculator. Example: (100).VAT(20) == 80

methods.name: Number.prototype.floor
methods.description: Floor number. Example: (232.349).floor(2), result: 232.34

methods.name: Number.prototype.padLeft
methods.description: Character padding - left.

methods.name: Number.prototype.padRight
methods.description: Character padding - right.

methods.name: Number.prototype.format
methods.description: A simple number formatting.

methods.name: Number.prototype.pluralize
methods.description: Pluralize number.

methods.name: Number.prototype.hex
methods.description: Number to hex format.

children.name: Date.prototype
children.description: Date prototype is available in each node.js / total.js script. Prototypes are defined in FrameworkUtils (utils.js). FrameworkUtils is a global variable.

methods.name: Date.prototype.add
methods.description:
Add years / months / days / hours / minutes / seconds to Date object.
Example: new Date().add('day', 1) or new Date().add('month', -1)

params.name: type
params.description: Add type: (s, m, h, M, d, y).

params.name: count
params.description: This number can be also negative.

methods.name: Date.prototype.format
methods.description: A date/time formatting. Example: new Date().format('dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm:ss') or new Date().format() -> returns ISO date without 'Z'.

methods.name: Date.prototype.compare
methods.description: Compare dates. Results: -1 = current date is earlier than @date, 0 = current date is same as @date, 1 = current date is later than @date.

methods.name: Date.compare
methods.description: Compare dates. Results: -1 = @d1 is earlier than @d2, 0 = @d1 is same as @d2, 1 = @d1 is later than @d2.

children.name: Array.prototype
children.description: Array prototype is available in each node.js / total.js script. Prototypes are defined in FrameworkUtils (utils.js). FrameworkUtils is a global variable.

methods.name: Array.prototype.take
methods.description: Take items from array.

methods.name: Array.prototype.orderBy
methods.description: Sort array.

methods.name: Array.prototype.skip
methods.description: Skip items in array.

methods.name: Array.prototype.trim
methods.description: Trim all strings in array.

methods.name: Array.prototype.wait
methods.description: This function removed asynchronically first item and then is executes this item. If array is empty then is executes onComplete parameter.

methods.name: Array.prototype.async
Array.prototype.where
methods.description: Create a collection from array by the 'fn' function.

methods.name: Array.prototype.find
methods.description: Find first item in array.

methods.name: Array.prototype.remove
methods.description: Remove specific items from array. If (fn) return true - then is item removed from array.

methods.name: Array.prototype.random
methods.description: Random one item from array.

methods.name: Array.prototype.randomize
methods.description: Randomize array. Example: [1, 2, 3, 4].randomize(), result: [4, 1, 3, 2]

children.name: Async

methods.name: async.cancel
methods.description: Cancel work.

methods.name: async.wait
methods.description: Add a function to async waiting list.

methods.name: async.await
methods.description: Add a function to async list.

methods.name: async.complete
methods.description: Run async functions.

params.name: callback
params.description: Complete function for all tasks. This function is alias for async.run([fn]).

methods.name: async.run
methods.description: Run async functions.

methods.name: async.cancel
methods.description: Cancel specific task or cancel all tasks.

methods.name: async.timeout
methods.description: Set timeout for specific task. This function sets timeout into the future and for current (waiting/pending/running) task. You can disabled timeout: async.timeout('name'); or async.timeout('name', 0).

methods.name: async.isRunning
methods.description: Is running specific task or is running are tasks?

methods.name: async.isWaiting
methods.description: Check if task is waiting for execute.

methods.name: async.isPending
methods.description: Check if task is in async task collection.

children.name: global

methods.name: CONFIG
methods.description: Read value from framework.config.

methods.name: RESOURCE
methods.description: Read value from framework.resource().

methods.name: INCLUDE
methods.description: Include script from framework.config['directory-source'] or from URL address. This function is alias for framework.source().

methods.name: SOURCE
methods.description: Include script from framework.config['directory-source'] or from URL address. This function is alias for framework.source().

methods.name: MODULE
methods.description: Get a module. This function is alias for: framework.module().

methods.name: CONTROLLER
methods.description: Get a controller. This function is alias for: framework.controller().

methods.name: MODEL
methods.description: Get a model. This function is alias for: framework.model().

methods.name: DATABASE
methods.description: Get a database. This function is alias for: framework.database().

methods.name: LOG
methods.description: Alias to framework.log()

methods.name: INSTALL
methods.description: Install some feature into the framework. This function is alias for: framework.install().

params.name: type
params.description: Can be: controller, module, model, view, definition, eval

params.name: declaration
params.description: Can be: URL address, string to eval or function to execute.

params.name: options
params.description: A custom options for new feature.

methods.name: UNINSTALL
methods.description: Uninstall some feature from the framework. This function is alias for: framework.uninstall().

params.name: type
params.description: Can be: controller, module, model, schema or view

params.name: options
params.description: A custom options for new feature.

methods.name: FUNCTION
methods.description: Alias to framework.functions. This function is alias for: framework.functions().

children.name: Builders.ErrorBuilder

methods.name: new ErrorBuilder
methods.description: Create an instance.

methods.name: builder.add

params.name: errorMessage
params.description: Error message. @ is automatically loaded from a resource by the name.

methods.name: builder.remove
methods.description: Remove error from ErrorBuilder.

methods.name: builder.hasError
methods.description: Has collection an error? If name is not defined then ErrorBuilder check it if collection contains any error.

methods.name: builder.read
methods.description: Read error message

methods.name: builder.clear
methods.description: Clear error collections.

methods.name: builder.replace
methods.description: Replace error message.

methods.name: builder.resource
methods.description: Set resource file.

params.name: prefix
params.description: Prefix for replacing an error message.

methods.name: builder.json

children.name: Builders.Pagination

properties.name: skip
properties.description: For DB: how many items to skip?

properties.name: take
properties.description: For DB: how many items to take?

methods.name: Pagination
methods.description: Constructor. Create an instance.

methods.name: builder.refresh
methods.description: Refresh Pagination informations about paging.

methods.name: builder.prev
methods.description: Get a prev page object. return { url: String, page: Number }.

params.name: format
params.description: Override current format for build URL address.

methods.name: builder.next
methods.description: Get a next page object. return { url: String, page: Number }.

params.name: format
params.description: Override current format for build URL address.

methods.name: builder.render
methods.description: Prepare pagination to array datasource.

params.name: max

params.name: format
params.description: Override current format for build URL address.

methods.name: new UrlBuilder

methods.name: builder.add

methods.name: builder.remove
methods.description: Remove a parameter.

methods.name: builder.read
methods.description: Read value from a parameter.

methods.name: builder.clear
methods.description: Clear URL parameter collection.

methods.name: builder.hasValue
methods.description: Check if collection contain value.

params.name: keys

params.name: keys

children.name: Builders.SchemaBuilder

methods.name: Builders.schema
methods.description: Create a schema. Schema supports joining others schemas.

params.name: name
params.description: Property name. By the property returns default value. Return undefined is a default.

params.name: isDefault
params.description: true === Builders.create() or builders.defaults(), false === Builders.prepare()

params.name: validator
params.description: Create a custom schema validation. This function is same as framework.onValidation delegate.

params.name: name
params.description: Property name. By the property returns default value. Return undefined is a default.

methods.name: Builders.remove
methods.description: Remove a schema.

methods.name: Builders.validation
methods.description: Set custom validation for the schema.

params.name: validator
params.description: Create a custom schema validation. This function is same as framework.onValidation delegate.

params.name: name
params.description: Property name. By the property returns default value. Return undefined is a default.

methods.name: Builders.validate
methods.description: Validate a schema.

methods.name: Builders.defaults
methods.description: Create a default object by the schema.

methods.name: Builders.create
methods.description: Create a default object by the schema. This function si same as Builders.defaults().

methods.name: Builders.prepare
methods.description: Prepare model by the schema. Properties which are not defined in schema will be removed. Long strings will be truncated by the schema definition.

methods.name: Builders.validation
methods.description: Create a schema validation.
